channel.title: Need help with my 508

item.title: Need help with my 508
item.dc:creator: @sickamore sickamore
item.description:
@sickamore wrote:

im just guessing but maybe doing something like this will work

case 391: if(p.isDead = false); if(p.eatDelay <= 0) { p.eatDelay = 4; p.combatDelay += 2; pi.deleteItem(p, itemId, itemSlot, 1); p.updateHP(22, true); p.requestAnim(829, 0); } } else if (p.isDead = true); sendMessage("Your dead , therefore you cannot eat!"); break;
i’m just guessing though…

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with my 508
item.dc:creator: @sw1tchez sw1tchez
item.description:
@sw1tchez wrote:

Hey, I need help with my 508 because, well, when you die, you lose your items, but if your eating while you have 0 hp, somehow it thinks that your still alive, and you dont lose your items.

Anyways, what im trying to do, is figure something out, and make it so if your health is 0, you can’t eat. Anyways, here is what I TRIED doing, but didn’t work.

case 391: if(p.eatDelay <= 0) { p.eatDelay = 4; p.combatDelay += 2; pi.deleteItem(p, itemId, itemSlot, 1); p.updateHP(22, true); p.requestAnim(829, 0); } if(p.isDead = true) return; break;

Yeah, that didn’t work out too good, it just makes it so when I eat a manta ray, I die !

Read full topic
